verses.text: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou hast cast us \w off|strong="H2186"\w*, thou hast \w scattered|strong="H6555"\w* us, thou hast been \w displeased|strong="H0599"\w*; O turn thyself to us \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 60.1 \ft Michtam: or, A golden Psalm\f*\f + \fr 60.1 \ft scattered: Heb. broken\f*

Thou hast made the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* to \w tremble|strong="H7493"\w*; thou hast \w broken|strong="H6480"\w* it: \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H7667"\w* thereof; for it \w shaketh|strong="H4131"\w*.

Thou hast \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* hard \w things|strong="H7186"\w*: thou hast made us to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* of \w astonishment|strong="H8653"\w*.

Thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* a \w banner|strong="H5251"\w* to them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* thee, that it may be \w displayed|strong="H5127"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w truth|strong="H7189"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
That thy \w beloved|strong="H3039"\w* may be \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w*; \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \add with\add* thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*; I will \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w*, I will \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and mete \w out|strong="H4058"\w* the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*.

\w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \add is\add* mine, and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add is\add* mine; \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* also \add is\add* the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add is\add* my \w lawgiver|strong="H2710"\w*;

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \add is\add* my \w washpot|strong="H5518"\w*; over \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* will I cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* my \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w*: \w Philistia|strong="H6429"\w*, \w triumph|strong="H7321"\w* thou because of me.\f + \fr 60.8 \ft triumph…: or, triumph thou over me: (by an irony)\f*

Who will \w bring|strong="H2986"\w* me \add into\add* the \w strong|strong="H4692"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*? who will \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me into \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*?\f + \fr 60.9 \ft strong…: Heb. city of strength?\f*

\add Wilt\add* not thou, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add which\add* hadst cast us \w off|strong="H2186"\w*? and \add thou\add*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add which\add* didst not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with our \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*?

\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* us \w help|strong="H5833"\w* from \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*: for \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \add is\add* the \w help|strong="H8668"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 60.11 \ft help of man: Heb. salvation, etc\f*
Through \w God|strong="H0430"\w* we shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w valiantly|strong="H2428"\w*: for he \add it is that\add* shall tread \w down|strong="H0947"\w* our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.
